title: Tom Pidcock Keeps Delivering Surprises: ‘My Ceiling is Higher, I Don’t Know my Level’
content:
British star has had a glittering early season, psyched by his new team and by a possible Giro d’Italia wildcard slot.

Read the full article at Tom Pidcock Keeps Delivering Surprises: ‘My Ceiling is Higher, I Don’t Know my Level’ on Velo.
author: sstokes
